title: Caroline Flint – Speech to 2011 Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Caroline Flint to the 2011 Labour Party conference on 29th September 2011.
content:
Conference, nearly 45 years ago, in this great city, the Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral opened.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
